type: Tutorial Step - Use Chrome or Safari!

definition.text: When running the frontend, use Chrome, or Safari on Mac! We are not testing on any other browsers!

paragraphs.text: It is a well-known fact that browsers behave differently, and we do know of features that do not work on other browsers. If you are on Chrome or Safari, click Next and continue. If not, do the following:
close this browser as is; do not close the tutorial...
open Chrome/Safari and paste the URL; the tutorial should be open on this step when you come back!
We offer online support, but we can't help you with any other browser!
